text: Branko Lustig (10 June 1932 â€“ 14 November 2019) was a Croatian movie producer. He was best known for winning Academy Awards for Best Picture for Schindler's List and Gladiator. He is the only Croatian to win two Academy Awards. He was a Holocaust survivor and was imprisoned at the Auschwitz and Bergen-Belsen camps during World War II as a child.Branko: Return to Auschwitz, nytimes.com, 15 April 2013.
